keyword.name: get
keyword.description: Retrieve a property value from an handle object.

keyword.name: invoke
keyword.description: Invoke method on an handle object.

keyword.name: ismethod
keyword.description: Return true if method of handle object.

keyword.name: isprop
keyword.description: Return true if property of handle object.

keyword.name: isvalid
keyword.description: Return true if variable h is a valid handle.

keyword.name: methods
keyword.description: Returns the methods name of an object handle.

keyword.name: properties
keyword.description: Returns the properties name of an object handle.

keyword.name: set
keyword.description: Set a property value of an handle object.
